DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to prove the bioequivalence of Montelukast Tablet under fasted conditions
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalency Study of Montelukast 10 mg Tablets Under Fasted Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on the physical examination, medical history, or clinical laboratory results during screening Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C. Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs. History of allergic or adverse response to montelukast or any comparable or similar product.
